website_summaries.verdict: Similar to the Big Red Rooster, but with less precise volume control. Choose it if you prefer the design.
pros: Can be powered by batteries or plugged into an outlet
Comes with six naturally soothing audio options
Compact enough to take along on outings
Straightforward settings are easy to navigate
cons: Can be difficult to achieve a moderate volume

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound machine for babies, batteries+plug in is a big plus!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Pros: Good variety of noises. Had the heartbeat sound both our children loved when they were newborns. It uses batteries or plug in. I've had sound machines for one or the other but both has been very helpful for home/travel with the kids. Loud enough that we normally don't put it to full volume. Cons: There is a noticeable sound loop. I only notice it when I'm doing late night feeding with the kids and I'm sitting there focusing on it. Otherwise I don't notice it. Interesting: The heartbeat sound is a little funky but still effective. Buttons make a clicking sound. Didn't bother us but it is pretty loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but ringing sound
customer_reviews.text: I really want to give this more stars. I like the design (easy to turn on/off with my foot while holding baby) and how it can stay on continuously. However, there is a weird sound in the background ALWAYS that drives me crazy. Almost like a ringing/beeping. It's subtle but just enough to be really annoying and distracting.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Volume adjustment poor
customer_reviews.text: So I got this one (the newer version) instead of the old version with the dial volume, and the heartbeat sound for my newborn which the old doesn't have, and I regret this purchase. The volume goes from virtually silent to super loud (then super super loud etc) in one click. There is no middle ground on this, it's either way too soft or way too loud. I had to move this far away from my baby's crib & cover the speaker with painters tape to muffle the sound and I was only on the 2nd volume. I hope they fix this moving forward cuz I would return this except I want the heartbeat sound....
customer_reviews.author: akaMomTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Repititious
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my own use - not a baby's - to drown out noise in motels. It does a good job, though the sound of the babbling brook recycles ever ten seconds or so with the same repeating sounds. O.K, but a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: W. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Machine
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other sound machines, this has no manual volume knob. I've had numerous sound machines, all of which broke within 6-12 months because of the poor quality of the volume knobs (potentiometers). This one has lasted me well over a year, and I see no reason why it would stop working, as the failure rate for push button switches is much lower. Makes great white noise at a wide range of volumes. Remembers prior state, allowing you to just push the on button and resume the same volume and sound selection as the prior use.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling and at home
customer_reviews.text: This works great at home and while we are on the go. downloading a decibel monitor on your phone is very helpful for the baby since baby supposed to sleep between 60 and 70 decibels with a sound machine so doesn't cause ear damage but it's also loud enough for the baby to focus on to help transition between sleep cycles. if you are sleep training this is the machine to get especially because it doesn't cost a ton however you might want to put some electrical tape over the light for the on button and never use the timer
customer_reviews.author: Addy Stott

customer_reviews.title: White Noise has rhythmic underlying sound
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something battery operated for when we were camping in our trailer at night. I noticed that the white noise sound has an underlying sound that has a pattern to it. I found it extremely distracting and it actually kept me from sleeping. All the other sounds don’t appear to have that sound.
customer_reviews.author: Cel

customer_reviews.title: Portable and works great
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my children’s bedrooms and during sessions with my massage therapy clients. These can be used plugged in or with batteries. I found a slight issue with the volume. There is one setting that is a bit too quiet but the next setting up is too loud. It could’ve a matter of personal preference, but it seems to me that there is too much of a “jump” in volume on just that spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amy LMT

customer_reviews.title: Horrible volume control.
customer_reviews.text: I own the older version but the volume control button stopped working after 9 months. After trying a few different brands, I bought the updated version since they changed the volume control. The first volume level is too quiet but the next level is super loud. Really wish they would find a fix for the volume issues because I like the sound options.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My baby sleeps with this on every night.
customer_reviews.text: My baby was a very finicky sleeper at 2 months and so i thought i would give this a try, works great, gets loud enough to drown out the loud stomping sounds of our upstairs neighbors. Right now the white noise sounds are what works for her, before i only played the cradle lullaby but when played at a low volume it sounded a bit staticy. Its good to travel with, uses 4 AA batteries. I take it with me to my moms when we go for a visit.
customer_reviews.author: Karol C

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and too quiet
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this sound machine. I wish I could return it but I threw away the box. Pros: continuous or timed play, powered by either battery or electrical plug, lightweight. Cons: poor tinny sound quality, way too quiet on the loudest setting, bright green light whenever it's on, heartbeat setting sounds like a horse walking at a very slow pace or a too slow heartbeat with a bad murmur. I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: hillarybug

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep in a while
customer_reviews.text: My husband snores and this device is so soothing that not only am I not hearing his snoring, nothing is waking me up at night. The only negative is I find it hard to get out of bed because I am in such a deep sleep when my alarm goes off. I have been using it for over a month and it really makes a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: CSKET

customer_reviews.title: Been using for 2 years, PERFECTION!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this machine. We have had it for over 2 YEARS and never had one issue. My daughter is 2 and still sleeps with it on every night. It’s so easy to use that she has even learned how to turn it on when she’s ready for bed time. We are now purchasing our second one for our newborn who was born 3 weeks ago. This is an amazing product and has been a life saver more times than I can count.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mapp

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud! Great for babies!
customer_reviews.text: This machine gets LOUD! I have ordered two other white noise machines before I got this one and returned them both because they were not loud enough. I’m using this in the nursery. Baby Sleep experts recommend that white noise for babies is as loud as a shower- and this machine does it! No, the quality of the sound is not perfect, but my baby doesn’t know that. It’s loud, and I can plug it into the wall socket and that’s what I was looking for. As a bonus, it’s very flat so I can easily travel with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: L.E.G.

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made product
customer_reviews.text: Started out thinking it was a steal at the price we got it for, not even a month in and it’s got issues. Such as: sudddenly shorts out and stops without ever being touched. Or we put our child to sleep with it on the lowest noise setting and then by morning it’s blaring at the loudest setting. Technical annoying issues. Get what you pay for. Very cheaply made product.
customer_reviews.author: Vitaliy

customer_reviews.title: Small. Loud. Transportable.
customer_reviews.text: Really love the ocean waves sound, the volume and the ability to have this battery or AC powered. It’s nice to be able to move it. We still have a smaller travel machine for day trips but we like this one better and it’s not huge. Biggest pet peeve is that the buttons do click loudly which is a poor design for a machine that goes with sleep; however we rarely have to adjust it and so far the button clicks have not woken the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay product. Not a fan of sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sound machine because I wanted one that you can push the buttons on it instead of turning the knob. This sound machine is okay. I really dont like the volume on it. It goes from low to really loud with pushing the + button once. And not a fan of the noise selections they have. I gave it a 3 because it works, it gets the job done and I have no problem with it yet. Otherwise I would probably give it a 2 because of the volume and the type of noise selections they have. I like my homedics one more.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and it's portable.
customer_reviews.text: We love this noise machine. I even bought one for myself now! We use the ocean sound, it's soothing and also blocks out other noises happening around the house so baby can sleep. You can use it plugged in, or with batteries. Small enough to take with you!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew&Bridget Murray

customer_reviews.title: Works for sleeping babies
customer_reviews.text: This is our second white noise machine and I really like it! The one we had before had a knob you turn to raise and lower the volume, so sometimes it was hard to find the exact volume every night that I wanted (since my son would play with it during the day). Since this one is just a +/- button, it is easy to find the right volume, and even if my son plays with it, it is easy to switch bag. The price is great as well. Some of the reviews I've read say that it didn't help their child sleep, but my son is able to sleep with it on every night. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Saya

customer_reviews.title: We use this for my son when he sleeps. ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this for my son when he sleeps. HOWEVER, whenever we set it to run all night long, it turns off about an hour later. I made sure we didn't set the timer. We even tried putting in new batteries and it still shuts out. It still shuts off. We exchanged it for a new one but it still did the same thing. I wish I could return it and get our money back since we need one to run all night.
customer_reviews.author: JC1696

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how much my baby actually likes it - but it works great. The only complaint I have is that the buttons are VERY loud when you push them and you're trying to keep your kid asleep. Other than that, it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: bizk11

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The loop in the sound is noticeable. Used while sharing room with newborn and found it hard to sleep. The heart beat is a very clicky and artificial sound. Would be a good prop for the tell tale heart, but not for soothing sleep. It does have a nice low profile and a battery option, but it doesn't matter when you don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany K

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great up until now, I’ve had it for almost 8 months and it just quit. One night it started switching to the heartbeat noise (talk about scaring the crap out of me!)and then by morning it was dead. Changed batteries, tried plugging in different outlets, nothing worked. Very disappointed, as this thig wasn’t the cheapest.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ziter

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality not so great but at low volumes it is good
customer_reviews.text: This sound machine is good but not great. I have noticed that there is some static like sound when using the heartbeat mode. It sounds grainy and not very clear which is disappointing. I do like the ability to set the timer for auto shutoff though and I like the size. I just wish the sound quality was a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Lippy

customer_reviews.title: This Little Noise Machine really works!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to new parents whose baby seemed to be crying several hours during the day & night & they needed something that would help them get a few hours sleep. Nothing seemed to be helping, so I gave this to them as a gift & I've been told it has really helped with calming the baby so they don't have to hold him all the time,
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Paventa

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Great little product for its suppose to do. My baby abuses this everyday (throws it around, turns it on and off). Still works great after 5 months. Has 5-6 different sounds. Good volume control. Only complain I have is the buttons are a little hard to press which makes a sound when pressed. Sucks to adjust volume when baby is already asleep bcos it makes a loud sound.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We have the small traveling one that we were using for his nightly bedtime but got tired of changing the batteries out so frequently. This was perfect to have with a wall plug (also has the battery option if we wanted) same exact sounds my son was used to. It’s not anything fancy but definitely does the job. Has 3 different times you can set for it to run and neutral gray/white color. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Linda R

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for baby’s room and it’s lightweight and slim for traveling with. The white noise can go quite loud, which is perfect for my little one who had started waking up to daddy’s alarm clock going off every morning. This has been just what he needed to drown out outside noise and provide a good sleep environment.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but could be improved upon.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -multiple sound options -reliable with plug in and battery option -great volume range -large buttons, easier for fumbling in the dark -has timer options and continuous sound option Places for improvement: -hard buttons with loud click-needs to be a softer button push. A dial instead of +/- buttons for volume Would be better. -heartbeat sound option is very artificial, not like womb sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Baby must have
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this noise machine and the price. Dont bother buying noise machines that are battery only unless you're using it specifically for traveling. This noise machine can be plugged in or battery operated. We have twins and honestly would not survive without these. If you're a first time parent wondering if this is a "need" it absolutely is. It provides them consistent sound so they sleep better and less restless.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M

customer_reviews.title: Horrible noise
customer_reviews.text: Defective. White noise has some weird pattern loop sound to it. It’s so annoying. It also came without a manual. The seal was broken and the volume up and down buttons are loose. I can’t return it because the shipping is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: madberna

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt run continuously
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said the buttons are loud. I don't like how ever time I turn it on it resets to the lullaby sound (which startles baby and myself) and it only runs for 15 minutes even though the timer is not set. Overall the older model which we had previously was a better design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Six months of life too short
customer_reviews.text: Just a little over six months old and it has decided to die. The last two weeks it was apparent it was on the way to imminent doom - started changing sound on its own or randomly turning off. Tonight at bedtime it wouldn’t turn on longer than two seconds. Really disappointed that something so important to our toddler sleep dies in six months.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and for power outages
customer_reviews.text: We would prefer the "white noise" setting, but it is a bit too high pitched for our daughter. So the ocean setting works well enough. Traveling is so easy with this machine! It's fairly small and takes batteries. The batteries lasted us 4 nights in a row without having to change them. Also if your power goes out while it's plugged in, the sound machine will keep going if it has batteries in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We can not live without our sound machine!
customer_reviews.text: I used it on the water setting when I was in labor. Very relaxing. Then, switched to white noise when baby arrived. Baby was into the lullaby music for the first month and now baby is 4.5 months and she loves the ocean waves sound. We have it plugged in at home so it doesn’t shut off at night and put batteries if we travel somewhere if she gets cranky.
customer_reviews.author: Zoila J Arellano

customer_reviews.title: Great for white noise, we have three!
customer_reviews.text: We use these for the entire family. One for each kid and one for us. Really helps us fall into REM sleep quicker and drowns out environmental noise when you're trying to sleep. Great for babies and toddlers so they don't wake up from noise in the house. Great for newborns as it reminds them of the womb and helps soothe them to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: but the quality is poor. I use the white noise and it sounds ...
customer_reviews.text: The actual speaker doesn’t produce a high quality sound. It makes all the noises it’s designed to, but the quality is poor. I use the white noise and it sounds really scratchy to me. It’s not too soothing to me, but it’s for my 6-month old daughter and I’m sure she doesn’t realize anything weird, so it’s working for her. But I wouldn’t use it for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jake F

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Is great for a travel noise machine. The only down side was if you turned the volume down you can’t turn it back up with out unplugging it to reset it. Don’t know if this was just a faulty machine, but other than that it works for what we need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: White noise has an obvious loop
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple and sleek looking machine. We bought it for white noise but immediately recognized the loop of "noise" that played. Since we can hear that, it's not relaxing and does not help us sleep. Unfortunately will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I literally used this thing maybe 4 times and it just stopped working. Was very disappointed because I have another Homedics noise machine I've had for 10 years and still going strong. Oh well, guess they don't make em like they used to. :(
customer_reviews.author: Allison Slade

customer_reviews.title: Super good sound machine
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a good sound machine for a while. While looking on Instagram I saw someone using this and I figured, why not try it. It is amazing! I like to use the summer day type sound because the cricket sound is soothing and seems super real. My son sleeps so much better now.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh V.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for moms on the go and home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sound machine in 2018. I love the volume control and the different noise sounds. It be used with batteries or the plug in. I absolutely love it. I can take with me in the car and when we travel. I love the fact that is so affordable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Be-you-2

customer_reviews.title: Love this !!
customer_reviews.text: I love this noise machine ! My son was a very light sleeper and any little noise woke him up but with alittle sound in the background the little sounds don’t bother him ! You can plug it in or go wireless and use batteries 😁 the only complaint I have is the volume control there is a big jump between the volume levels so it can be either to loud or to quiet
customer_reviews.author: Breanna trudell

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I guess I’m comparing it to another white noise machine we already have. It’s easy to use, I just wish it had more white noise options, rather than nature-sounds. I like to use a steady sound vs a rythmatic sound (heartbeat/‘wave). It does work very well. And the price is great (my other was about $50). This one is much easier to control and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Battery function died after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing but I had to only give it 3 stars because a couple of days ago the ability to use the battery part just died and I’m past the window of returning it so now I have to use the cord which is a bummer because I bought it specifically for the battery option. Other than that it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Travels well
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for one that travels well and seems more durable. This did the trick. However our other one has a might light feature which helped when I would feed baby in the middle of the night, so with baby #2 on the way we’ll use that and have this one for my toddler and when we travel. The other one we have doesn’t travel well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lentini

customer_reviews.title: For parents with noisey neighbors
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! I live in a duplex (second floor) and unfortunately my downstairs neighbors LOVE to party every weekend and have a ton of people over. This noise machine cancels out all of the downstairs noise that was keeping ME and my baby awake at night. Even if I'm trying to get things done at home, I turn it on when baby is napping and it distracts from traffic noise and footsteps/closing doors. Love it. I highly recommend to all moms!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied but poor volume control.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for night time use. I have used it for a few weeks now and here is my review, Pros: lasts all night when plugged in, has good options for white noise, baby liked it and slept all night Cons: volume control is terrible. It’s either too loud or too low so basically Have to keep it going at loud volume. Also not compatible with travel as it needs to be plugged in. Overall I’m satisfied but the volume control could be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Nandini Sakurikar

customer_reviews.title: Cant live without
customer_reviews.text: So far 4 months in and still going strong. We use it every night and every nap time. Cant sleep without it. Even I'm getting used to it haha
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: 1 for every kid!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these for each of my children. I had a previous version with a knob to turn on and adjust volume, which the knob stopped working, but this new design does not have that issue. These work great and are very portable.
customer_reviews.author: irocz8292

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My baby had a sound machine that only used batteries and I got tired of changing them so I got this one that can both plug into the wall and use batteries. It definitely has enough volume, is super to use even in the dark, and I like the timer feature even though we usually just leave it on all night. I have it plugged in in her room, but I like that I can put in batteries to take with us on vacation!
customer_reviews.author: ksdenson

customer_reviews.title: So, so
customer_reviews.text: Our machine broke after 1 year of use. It was okay while it lasted but I didn’t care much for it. The buttons to change the sound are way too loud. I liked the idea of playing music constantly or just for 15, 30 or 45 min. Anyhow, I am looking now to buy a new sound machine and will try a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect noise machine
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these for each kid and am thinking of buying a third as a spare just in case. They work great and last a really long time with only the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We had the older version and the turn dial broke. So we got this new version which J like better. My son likes to turn it on himself. With the turn dial, it was always too loud and ask had to adjust it secretly. Now I set the sound and my son just hits the power button. Nice variety of sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This has been a staple in our home for 6-1/2 years. Every year we have to purchase a new one bc the sound starts to crackle but it’s a great but. I love that it’s battery operated as well. We can easily pack it along for our camping trips and not have to worry about getting a great night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: ... scratchy when turned low and the white noise sounds like it has a weird part in the loop that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay sound machine but it sounds very scratchy when turned low and the white noise sounds like it has a weird part in the loop that you keep hearing and distracts me so I can't stand listening to it. My baby likes it okay, but not much of a difference in his sleeping
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my newborn! I love that you can use it with batteries or the ac adapter. I can easily move it from room to room during the day, but plug it in overnight. I took one star away since I don't really like the white noise setting... the ocean/wave setting sounds more like white noise to me and is much more pleasing!
customer_reviews.author: RKRushingTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable and great
customer_reviews.text: Love this sound machine! We have 2, one for each child and it works perfect. I love the different sounds and the volume control. I also really like that it plugs into the wall and I don't have to mess with batteries. For the price I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: smaldon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the baby room
customer_reviews.text: Worked just as advertised. No complaints. We use it every night in our baby room. It's a small room so we keep the volume low. But you can turn the volume way up if you needed that for some reason. Helps to mask the noises everyone else is making while the little one is getting to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Machine for Everything, especially travel!
customer_reviews.text: Needed another sound machine for our next baby coming and this one is GREAT so far! What I love is that it is portable so I can take it anywhere with batteries or I can plug it in. My first borns sound machine is big and hard to pack but this is so compact and doesn't stick out like a sore thumb. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: I gave 3 stars because...
customer_reviews.text: Its actually a good product, now i only gave 3 stars because its not that loud. My baby likes her white noise sound very loud and the highest level of volume on this id actually pretty low. Whic sucks. I have to put the machine right next to my baby ear. But its a good machine works goodm the only down side is the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Santos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound machine - we have one for each of our toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: The ocean wave sound is not quite as good as our other units but works for our toddlers so who cares. The flatter design (old versions were kind of cylindrical) means it doesn’t fall off the table as easily since center of gravity is lower. No light show but frankly that scared our kids so I don’t mind. Feels of a higher quality than other units we’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: She's sleeping through the night!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is SO AMAZING. It makes a beautiful sound, soothes by baby to sleep, and keeps her from hearing us while she is asleep. We have used it since she came home from the hospital and she started sleeping through the night at 3 months. No idea if this is why, but IT'S AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, not a real sound though. Takes up quite a bit of room on the night table. Big buttons make it easy to use in the dark. Bright light that I put a piece of tape over
customer_reviews.author: Drew82

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Works great as advertised. It does soothe the baby. We plug it in but the battery feature is handy when no plug in is near. If I had to pick out one thing it's kinda hard to pick up with one hand with baby in other. Maybe a small handle?? All in all works great and we'll made
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: Best noise machine!
customer_reviews.text: We broke 3 noise machines before we just went ahead and bought this one for our second! Our first has had it for 3 years and we have had no issues with the cords or batteries. All of our other noise machines had the cord break at the input... and if your kids love noise machines like ours do you know that batteries make you nervous! We also have traveled with this one numerous times and it is compact enough to travel. Love the different options for noise and the simplistic look!
customer_reviews.author: KMark

customer_reviews.title: Wish I found this sooner
customer_reviews.text: This sound machine is SO easy to use and is SO convenient!!! Its perfect for everyday use and traveling. My toddlers love the different sounds. They particularly favor the creek sound and the lullaby. I would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: If you want your baby to sleep, click “Buy Now”
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. You can set it to be on all night which is a must for us. Only complaint is the intervals between lose levels are variable and I wish there were more level options but for the price point I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: erinfin

customer_reviews.title: quality sounds, the big problem is t the volume
customer_reviews.text: quality sounds, the big problem is t the volume. the volume option is as follows: 1. whisper low 2. LOUD 3. SCREAMING LOUD - #1 was so low there was no point in using it, #2 was so loud it was keeping kids up. we had to use #2 and cover the speaker with a wash cloth. they need a re-design on the volume
customer_reviews.author: Denverite

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! I use this as a sound machine for my daughter at bedtime/nap time because she is a semi light sleeper. This blocks out all kinds of noises. We use the ocean option because it is really soothing. Love that the power button and volume control are different buttons unlike the other version.
customer_reviews.author: Gisselle bucarelo

customer_reviews.title: great portable and little device
customer_reviews.text: I used to have the bulb like mybaby noise machine, and I think that I liked the quality of sound better with the bigger one, but I love my small purse friendly noise machine. Happy with this in all aspects expect the sound quality. if this is they only one you have ever gotten then you won't even know the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Chelbs

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this sound machine for my son for the last 10 months and it is an absolute staple now! He sleeps so well with the white noise. No more waking up because mommy is doing dishes or because we accidentally have the tv too loud. Just ordered another for our babygirl on the way! Hope she likes it as much as he does.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this sound machine. I've used this same exact one for my son for three years, and I just purchased another one for my new baby. I especially love that it has the option to use batteries. My new baby's room only has one working outlet right now, so the battery feature has been a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Love this sound machine. Ready so many reviews and decided on trying this one and so glad we did. It’s a perfect size and the sound does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has a battery back up function. Great sounds and clear. Good options for listening all around. Got it for my newborn but ended up liking it for my husband and I too
customer_reviews.author: Darcy essmyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: The only noise that we use is the brook, but it does get very loud and doesn't sound muffled or anything. I like how it remembers the last settings I put it on the last time I turned it off, except when you unplug and of course. We'll use it every single night, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Haight

customer_reviews.title: Keeps turning off
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 4 months and it worked fine for a while, but about a month ago it started turning off randomly. This has increased so that it now turns off every 5 minutes or so. I keep it plugged in so its not a battery issue. I dont have any other problems with electric appliances in my office. I am a massage therapist and I use this during sessions- so having it turn off suddenly over and over again is extremely disruptive. Can you please send me a replacement or a refund? I feel this product is a complete defect, and will write a corresponding review if it is not resolved.
customer_reviews.author: josh osher

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: THANK GOD FOR SOUND MACHINES. This one really worked for us. Small enough to be portable and comes with us on all vacations. Many different sounds. Timed options or can run all night. Can be battery operated or plugged in to an outlet. We bought one for baby's daycare classroom as well, really helped him sleep. Now he sleeps through anything.
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great for bedtime
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson loved this to go to sleep to. He bring it with him when he sleeps over and takes it back home when he goes. He like being able to choose which sound he wanted to go to sleep to for the night.
customer_reviews.author: MannaBanana

customer_reviews.title: All are great. We use nightly
customer_reviews.text: I have two older green models and silver model. All are great. We use nightly, and only the first green one is still going. While these buttons are loud, the volume stays from the last use, so it’s a big win. And we don’t need to change the volume during the night so it doesn’t matter. Great buy for kids
customer_reviews.author: Dr1

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: My daughters have one and I purchased one for when the babies come to my house. No problems it's a great item and has lasted a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Johns

customer_reviews.title: Sound Switches by itself
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sound machine for my toddlers bedroom and I always set it to "white noise." However, the sound machine will randomly switch from "white noise" to " heartbeat" scaring my toddler and waking him up screaming. Makes for one scared toddler and one very unhappy momma! Don't do it!
customer_reviews.author: David Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Broken but I did like the small size
customer_reviews.text: This sound machine didn't work when it arrived. The volume button particularly wouldn't work, sent for a replacement so we will see if the new one works or not. It was nice and small, and battery or plug in operated so I did like the look and feel of it. Hoping the next one actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Kidd

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this sound machine.....bought it for the new puppy and ended up using it myself........ocean sound is so soothing. You can use batteries or plug it in. Convenient, small but sturdy. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doretta A. Duggan

customer_reviews.title: A lifeline for mothers
customer_reviews.text: We use these bad boys in the children’s hospital I work at, so I naturally bought my best friend one when her daughter was born. She was running her vacuum to get her to sleep, which basically simulates white noise. Now she takes this with her everywhere she goes to console her babe
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sound machine. Each of our four family members has one in their rooms and I’m quickly replacing them all with this one. The loudness is great. And I love that it’s a push button as opposed to a knob.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after six months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this noise machine at first and could have given it a 5 star review- I like the noise options and it was nice and portable. But unfortunately, it stopped working after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: JMC5

customer_reviews.title: Portable, very functional, some issues with volume changing
customer_reviews.text: Very nice that it plugs in but also is portable with battery. Small easy to move around. Great that it can have a timer but also can go indefinitely. The only issue is the volume mid way through tends to jump up more than I would like when changing the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than having a power/volume knob
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sound machine to replace another one I had purchased. The other sound machine had a power/volume knob that apparently shorts out. This sound machine has a power and volume buttons. MUCH better!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! We just recently purchased for my 5 year old. She was using an iPad but I didn’t like that it didn’t shut off. This is great and has its own timer. And is great to travel, forget the cord and use the battery feature!! It lasts a LONG time on batteries. We haven’t replaced the first set and we’ve only used the battery feature.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works fine and love its portability
customer_reviews.text: We use this in situations where our power goes out and we can't use our plug-in. Works fine and love its portability, but the white noise loop is painfully obvious. My ears pick up on the most annoying, repetitive sounds and keeps me awake, but the kids haven't seemed to mind and that's what's important, right? ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done - find it cheaper at Bed Bath & Beyond
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Bought this for my toddler’s room to replace the iPad we have been using since her birth. You can find this same unit at Bed Bath & Beyond for $4 less, $8 less if you use a coupon. I’ll be heading there to order another one for the baby on the way.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Works through the night. Could use more sound level options.
customer_reviews.text: It works well. I just wish there were more options on sound level. It seems either a little too loud or a little too soft. I have a nicer fan-style white noise maker that I use most of the time for my baby (now 10 months old), so I use this one mainly when traveling for him. When at home I actually use it for myself because I'm a light sleeper and have noisy neighbors. I pretty much only use the static option. What I love most is the ability to keep it on throughout the night.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah O

customer_reviews.title: Solid provision of background noise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to facilitate my husband's transition to night shift so that he can sleep during the day. He is one of these people who just has to have white noise. He favors the ocean setting. The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is because the quality of the sound is decidedly fake and unnatural. That can annoy adults but I doubt it would be a problem for babies and young children.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Naef Allen

customer_reviews.title: Older version was better - this one is okay
customer_reviews.text: We had the earlier version of this for 9 months until it just stopped working one day. This one is okay but we prefer the older version, which had a dial to control the volume and better sound quality. This one has + and - buttons to control the sound and we can't get it right - it's always too quiet or too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Lasted 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. After 3 weeks it quit playing all night long after multiple attempts. This is my second sound machine from mybaby as the first one did the same thing. I've spent too much money trying to find a sound machine from this company that works
customer_reviews.author: Daniel b

customer_reviews.title: Great product for babies of all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product because of the low price, but needn't have worried. It is perfectly adequate to block out any serious noise from my fellow condo owners! As a plus, it has has a battery option in addition to the plug-in, making it perfect for travel. It is very compact.
customer_reviews.author: karla moore

customer_reviews.title: and the timer is nice to that it doesn't have to be on all ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my teenager, even though it says it is for babies. There is one lullaby but has a variety of other sounds for older people, white noise, night sounds, waves etc.. and the timer is nice to that it doesn't have to be on all night, helps them get to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: CPM

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need and simple.
customer_reviews.text: The variety of sounds/noise is great. Volume spectrum is broad and has a timer for 15, 30 and 60 minutes in case you just need it to fall asleep. Can leave the cord at home when traveling and use the battery. We've had no problems with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Topscher

customer_reviews.title: I have 2! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my baby! I have two! One for home and one I keep in her diaper bag. She loves the white noise. And I like how it has three different timers or no timer if you want. It can get loud if your baby is really fussy and quiet for sleeping. I would buy this for anyone having a baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: amanda taunt

product_meta.title: White Noise Machine for Babies | 6 Soothing Lullabies for Newborns, Sound Therapy for Travel, Relaxing, Kids, Newborns, Toddlers | Baby Songs, Adjustable Volume, Auto-off Timer | MyBaby SoundSpa
product_meta.description:
HoMedics is committed to helping you create a healthy home environment to relax your body, de-stress your mind, and simplify your life. Founded in 1987, we are a trusted leader in health and wellness. Our brand is widely recognized for home massage products and continues to be one of the leading innovators in massage technology. Additionally, we carry a full line of in-home wellness products, including air filters, humidifiers, white noise machines, fitness monitors, aroma diffusers, and more.

The HoMedics MyBaby SoundSpa Portable creates the perfect environment for your baby to sleep soundly. Choose from 6 soothing sounds including: Heartbeat, White Noise, Cradle, Ocean, Brook, and Summer Night. It features an adjustable volume setting allowing you to mask background noises that may affect your baby’s sleep. The MyBaby Soothing Sound Machine helps ensure that your baby gets a full night of sleep every night.

One of the many features is an auto-off timer, which can be set for 15, 30, or 60 minutes to conserve energy. This is a great option if you are putting your little one down for a nap. The MyBaby SoundSpa sound machine is small and lightweight. It easily fits into a bag or suitcase, making it the perfect travel companion for moms and babies alike!

Our Soothing Sleep Machine has many uses. It not only helps babies and children fall asleep, but it can also be used to calm them down if they are fussy. The MyBaby White Noise Machine can help more than just babies too! Adults can also use it to tune out distractions or boost your focus while you study or work.
feature_bullets: 6 SOOTHING LULLABY SOUNDS:The perfect gift for new parents this holiday season. Choose from 6 digitally recorded relaxing sounds: Heartbeat, White Noise, Cradle, Ocean, Brook, and Summer Night. The MyBaby’s sounds are designed to mimic a natural environment to create a relaxing, soothing environment for your baby. The adjustable volume setting allows you mask background noise ensuring your baby gets a good night’s sleep

COMPACT & PORTABLE FOR TRAVEL: The MyBaby Soothing Sound Machine is small and lightweight, it easily fits into your purse, bag or suitcase. Bring it with you to create a familiar sleeping environment for your baby no matter where you travel!

HELPS YOUR BABY SLEEP AND RELAX: Add HoMedics MyBaby’s soothing noises to your baby’s sleep routine to help them fall asleep faster and stay asleep longer. The natural sounds will help lull your baby to sleep whether it’s nap time or night time. A sleeping baby means more sleep for the whole family!

AUTO-OFF TIMER: The Sleep Sound Machine’s therapeutic sounds can be used for relaxation, sleep, or travel. You can choose to play the relaxation sounds continuously, or choose from the auto-off timer. The timer features 3 options: 15, 30, or 60 minutes. It can be plugged into a wall outlet with the adapter(included) or powered by 4 ‘AA’ batteries (not included)
WHAT’S INSIDE THE BOX: MyBaby SoundSpa White Noise Machine. Wall outlet adapter. 30-day money back guarantee
